word:
(257)                      Sanitarium, California B. 329-1905                December 11, 1905. 

Dear Brother Burden:-- 
     . . . . 
     Later. This morning, Dec. 14, I could not sleep after one o'clock, so I arose and dressed, and have come to my office to complete the letter that I began writing to you two or three days ago. We are interested in every movement made at Loma Linda.
